thread.title: Christa Cabriales Cabriales
thread.title_full: Fabletics reviewed by Christa Cabriales Cabriales

author: Christa Cabriales Cabriales
title: Christa Cabriales Cabriales
text:
I just placed my second order with Fabletics. My first order was an outfit put together by the site. The first order consisted of: Shape
Bronte Millie L/S Tee, Petal Capri, Dash Seamless Bra II. I love every piece that came! They were all very, very cute, and extremely comfy. My second order should arrive in a week and I will be reviewing: Femina Tank & Brogan Mesh Legging. I'm very excited for these items. All in all, I love cute workout clothes which this site offers. I think the prices are too high at times, so I tend to pick items based off what I would normally spend. I skip a lot of months, and purchase a new outfit maybe every 3-4 months.
